long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to the unconventional world of Baldi's Basics, a game that ingeniously blends horror, education, and nostalgia into one unique experience. Originally designed as a parody of 1990s educational games, Baldi's Basics has garnered a significant following due to its challenging gameplay and the eerie undertones hidden behind its simplistic graphics. In this guide, we'll explore effective strategies, hidden secrets, and tips to help you navigate Baldi's schoolhouse and emerge victorious.

Baldi's Basics challenges players to collect seven notebooks scattered throughout a school while avoiding Baldi, the gameâ€™s antagonist. Each notebook contains a series of educational questions; the first two are simple, but the third is an unsolvable math problem that angers Baldi when answered incorrectly. As you make mistakes, Baldi's speed increases, adding tension and difficulty to your quest.
